message_1:
Consider the following substitution cipher:

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ 
BDFHJLCPRTXVZNYEIWGAKMUSQO 

Encrypt the following message using the aforementioned cipher:

"HELLO WORLD"

What is the resulting ciphertext?
message_2:
Using the given substitution cipher, we can encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" as follows:

H -> J
E -> Y
L -> P
L -> P
O -> R
(space remains unchanged)
W -> D
O -> R
R -> T
L -> P
D -> F

So, the resulting ciphertext is "JYPPR DRTPF".
